metadata.name: PC Gamer [GOMA]
metadata.description:
As part of the artistic research project CubaCreativa (2014).

This project focuses on digital social creativity and alternative forms of production in survival cultures. PC Gamer is an archive on the blockchain of these creative practices. It presents functional 3D prototypes that ironically could be produced on an industrial level. 

Technique: 3D Digital Sculpture
Software: Blender 3.0.0
Year: 2022

Description:
Windows Server 2008
ASUS Prime B360M-A Board
Geforce RTX 2060 card
Adata RAM Memory
1 Tera Seagate barracuda hard drive
Readers LG
3 Fans
Power supply EVGA 600 BQ, 80 plus gold
Fulda Carat Attiro Tire
